title: The Strength of Dormant Ties
description: A tiny lesson with a big payoff: The Strength of Dormant Ties.

hook.text: Your most valuable contacts may be people you haven't spoken to in years. Dormant ties are hidden gold.

discovery.text: Levin et al. found dormant ties provide more novel information than current contacts because they've diverged.

twist.text: Reactivating a dormant tie is easier than making a new one. The trust foundation still exists.

climax.text: Reconnect with genuine curiosity: 'I saw your post and wondered what you're working on.' Simple and authentic.

punchline.text: Old connections aren't dead connections. They're sleeping assets.

quiz.question: Why are dormant ties valuable?
options: They provide more novel information than current contacts
